title: Watch: Brawl Breaks Out Between Customers & Staff At Bhopal Restaurant, Over Poor Food Quality
text:
One of the few things that people absolutely do no fancy compromising on, is food. Especially when we go to a restaurant, quality of food cannot be messed with.

A fight over food broke out recently in a restaurant in Bhopal between customers and the staff. Apparently the fight happened after a customer complained about the poor quality of the video. The CCTV footage of the video that is going viral, one can see people beating each other up with whatever came handy - bottles, utensils and what not. Men and even a couple of women are visible in the video, engaging in the brawl.

#WATCH Madhya Pradesh: Scuffle broke out between customers & staff at a restaurant in Bhopal, allegedly after customers complained of poor quality food at the restaurant. (28.10.2019) pic.twitter.com/9w5HptMk1o — ANI (@ANI) October 30, 2019

As a result of the hue and cry, police was called to the restaurant"As soon as we received the information, our police staff was immediately sent to the restaurant. A clash occurred between the customers, waiters and other restaurant staff as the food got delayed. We have registered a case against both the parties", ANI quoted ASP Sanjay Sahu as saying.

Reportedly, a restaurant staff has accused the customers of misbehaving with the female staff at the restaurant.

"The customers entered the restaurant kitchen and started beating the staff. A few girls tried to stop the fight but the customers touched us in an inappropriate manner. They abused and attacked the woman staff as well. The customers were drunk," ANI quoted a woman staffer as saying.

If that's true then strict action needs to be taken against the offenders. It's okay to not like the food and complain about it, even ask for a discount or refund. It's not okay to beat up the staff over it.
